data.text: Avɨrɨkɨmuhɨmu Hɨvɨ ha umi. Kamatɨhi kimaŋgima hɨvɨ hañɨ paka pɨhɨrɨhihi, Maria pɨhu aru Makdalandu haŋambɨ naŋga Maria muhaŋambɨ, Jisasɨndu sava ha ŋgɨmɨndaŋ vata, payɨmu.28.1 Kimaŋgima hɨvɨ ha Sande taya.

Kamatɨhuhu Aru nɨmandu kutɨkara Gotɨndu pɨhuyɨ kɨta mɨŋgami. Kamatɨhi pɨrɨmama aru sɨkwɨ payɨmi. Kamata kutɨkara hama tɨmba muŋgɨ kumba mɨka yɨvuvihɨmi haŋandɨhin tɨhuyaparahi tɨvɨmbu umi. Kamata kandɨ hɨmba hañɨ mɨnzɨta kɨyɨmi.
28.3: Dan 10.6 naŋga, Mt 17.2 naŋga, Sɨ 1.10Kutɨkara hamandu kɨpumɨka ha ñɨma mɨŋaparahi sɨñandɨ maña sɨñandɨmañandɨmi. Kamatɨhi nuŋandɨ mɨkwɨrɨ haŋandɨhin ndahara ihumukɨrɨ maña kɨyɨmi.
Kamatɨhi saŋganzara haŋɨnɨŋ nɨŋambirɨm pɨŋitɨhi, nanaŋgarata, kɨmuhɨmu ŋɨnɨŋ maña yɨvurahamu.
Kamatɨhu Aru nɨmandu kutɨkara hama yahata navundi arɨkimbatɨrɨm nɨmavami, Pɨŋimandumara. Yi narɨŋ ŋgin, narɨ Jisas kru ahuandɨñɨ yɨvuwɨrɨmbusɨmu hamaŋ ŋgɨrɨm para.
28.6: Mt 12.40 naŋga, 16.21Nu nɨñɨ maŋgɨyɨ. Nuŋambi kuha ambami maña yahamɨri. Narɨ arɨkimbat pata upɨ karɨhasɨmi nɨŋandɨhin ŋgamara.

28.7: Mt 26.32Kamataharɨm narɨ arɨkimbat aŋga uhavuta nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ nɨmavamba ambamara, Nu sava humba ha mitata aŋga yahamɨri. Indarɨmara, nuwɨsa kasiramata Galilivu uyɨ, harɨm nuŋ kandɨhambu ŋgɨmandɨra, vamba ambamara. Yi kuyu kandɨnɨ narɨŋ ambavarɨrɨm pan, vami.Gotɨndu kutɨkara naŋga kuyundavaramu
Navundi arɨkimbat pɨŋisaŋarandɨmu, hara kɨnzɨhɨnzɨtɨmaŋgaramu. Kamata sarɨwayɨŋandi sava ha mitata tɨvaramata Jisasɨndu sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ ambavarɨrɨm umu.
Kamatɨhu Jisas arɨkimbatɨŋ kɨndɨñɨ ŋgata nɨmavami, Kɨvɨsɨhu vami. Kamatɨhi arɨkimbat nu kɨyɨmi arɨhañɨ uta, nuŋandɨ tandanzambɨrɨ hañɨ mɨŋahandata nuŋandɨ ñɨmbi tɨhuyahamu.
28.10: Hi 2.11Kamatɨhu Jisas arɨkimbatɨŋ nɨmavami, Pɨŋimandumara. Narɨ arɨkimbat uta ambɨtɨra yaranava Galilivura umu. Yaŋ kandambu ŋgɨmandɨyu, vami.

Navundi arɨkimbat uhuhu, saŋganzara Jisasɨndu sava karatamata kɨyɨmu hañɨndu muvɨra pɨhu aru hañɨ indɨhumu. Kamata Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋɨndu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana yɨvurahamirɨm ambavaramu.

28.12-13: Mt 27.64Kamatɨhu Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋɨndu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ naŋga Israel hatindu aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ tɨhɨruta, kuyu mu sɨmahamu. Kamata saŋganzara haŋɨnɨŋ tɨmbahɨrɨs sambɨ ŋguta, ambamu, Uta nɨmavamba ambamara, Kɨvɨyɨ karɨhaharɨŋgarɨŋ, nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ pata nuŋandɨ patɨ ha kipa mɨŋayu, vamba ambamara.
Kamatɨra gavamandu aru hama kuyu kanɨŋandɨhin indarɨta narɨŋ yɨvutatamɨrɨmɨtiŋgata, arara nu naŋga kuyu mɨŋasɨrɨvɨm. Kamatɨrɨŋ narɨ kuyu maŋgavɨrɨmandɨra, vamu.

Kamavahu saŋganzara haŋɨnɨŋ tɨmbahɨrɨs haŋandɨhin mɨŋata, aru miku haŋɨnɨŋ ambaramamu mañamaña andɨmu. Kamatɨhu kuyu kanɨŋandɨhin Juda hati indarɨta mɨtumu. Juda hati kuyu kanɨŋandɨhinɨrɨm ambavararasɨmu. Patavata tɨhu ndahara kuyu sɨwɨmaña ndaya ambavarandu.
Kamata 11 sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ Galilirɨm umu. Uta Jisas apu ambami hañɨ yɨvurahamu.
Kamata Jisasɨŋ ŋgata, nuŋandɨ ñɨmbi tɨhuyahamu. Hara sɨmbɨrasara muvɨrandu indarɨmit arɨkita kɨyɨmi.

28.18: Dan 7.13-14 naŋga, Mt 11.27 naŋga, Jo 3.35 naŋga, 13.3 naŋga, Sɨ 2.36 naŋga, 1 Ko 15.27 naŋga, Ef 1.20-22 naŋga, Hi 1.2 naŋga, Sk 17.14Kamatɨhu Jisas arɨhañɨ pata nurɨŋ nɨmavami, Got nuŋandɨ pɨhuyɨndu naŋga pɨrɨ nɨñɨndu muhɨmɨmuhɨm karatamatarɨm yaŋ ñɨmbi ŋgumi.

28.19: Mk 16.15-16 naŋga, Sɨ 1.8Kamataharɨm uta krunavundi sɨhanaŋga pɨrɨvɨsa muvundumuvundu andɨtɨra yandɨ sɨmbɨrasara yɨvurahamu. Kamatɨndɨ, Yavandu ñɨmbiyɨ, naŋga nuŋandɨ Ñɨŋindu ñɨmbiyɨ, naŋga nuŋandɨ Mavɨñɨŋindu ñɨmbiyɨ kukuyɨ mɨŋaŋgɨrumara.

28.20: Mt 18.20 naŋga, Jo 14.23Kamata yi narɨŋ kuyu ŋgumin haŋɨnɨŋ sɨhanaŋga nurɨŋ ambaramamara. Kamatɨra kuyu kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋɨndaya mɨŋahandamu. Indarɨmara. Yi imutamut narɨ naŋga kɨndin. Ututa pɨrɨ nɨŋandɨhin naŋga muhɨmɨmuhɨm siŋgundɨrɨmandɨ.
